trans-unit.source: Defines the interface implemented by the environment hosting the workflow designer and compiler to provide environment-specific compilation information during the validation and compilation processes.
trans-unit.target: 定義由環境實作的介面，該環境裝載工作流程設計工具和編譯器，以便在驗證和編譯處理程序期間，提供環境特定的編譯資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether types are checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出是否已選取型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if types are checked, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別已選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: During the validation phase of workflow compilation, a workflow source document is rejected if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> property is `true` and the workflow or the companion rules file directly references any .NET Framework types not present on a list of authorized types.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程編譯的驗證階段，工作流程來源文件遭拒如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A>屬性是`true`與工作流程或附屬規則檔案直接參考任何.NET Framework 型別不存在的清單授權的類型。

trans-unit.source: The list of authorized types is an XML document where each entry indicates an `Assembly`, a `Namespace`, a `TypeName`, and an `Authorized` {`true` or `false`} indicator.
trans-unit.target: 已授權型清單是 XML 文件其中每個項目表示`Assembly`、 `Namespace`、 `TypeName`，和`Authorized`{`true`或`false`} 指標。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to an entry on the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別對應到清單上的項目。

trans-unit.source: Also note that wildcard character designations are allowed, to include or exclude complete namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 亦請注意，也允許指定萬用字元，以包括或排除完整的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For example, using `Type="System.*"` includes all types in <xref:System>, including types contained in child namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用`Type="System.*"`包括中的所有類型<xref:System>，包括子命名空間中所包含的類型。

trans-unit.source: The use of a list of authorized types is controlled by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> option **/checktypes** or by using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 已授權型清單的使用由<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler>選項**/checktypes**或使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the programming language used by the environment, such as Visual Studio, when compiling the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 取得當編譯工作流程時，環境所使用的程式設計語言，如 Visual Studio。

trans-unit.source: The name of the programming language used by the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 開發環境所使用的程式設計語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of the `Language` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範 `Language` 屬性的實作。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root namespace set for the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得專案的根命名空間組。

trans-unit.source: The name of the root namespace.
trans-unit.target: 根命名空間的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in Visual Basic compilation environment to pass the root namespace of the project to the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於 Visual Basic 編譯環境中，以傳遞專案的根命名空間至編譯器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of the `RootNamespace` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範 `RootNamespace` 屬性的實作。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。
